outputs.output_descr:
The aim of the project is to:
1. Training national professionals in conservation and maintenance of artefacts
2. Training national professionals to design of exhibitions and installation and maintenance of artefacts in museums and in the whole work of librarians
3. Training national engineers in building renovation and preservation including construction supervision and maintenance of buildings

project_descr: Training for Restoration and Display of the Dar Al-Athar Al-Islamiyyah Collection at the Kuwait National Museum
